cards.name: Ancient Battleground
cards.text: Each friendly creature cannot reap and gains, “After Fight: Gain 1.”

cards.name: Autocannon
cards.text: After a creature enters play, deal 1 to it.

cards.name: Banner of Battle
cards.text: Each friendly creature gets +1 power.

cards.name: Barehanded
cards.text: Play: Put each artifact on top of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Bilgum Avalanche
cards.text: After you forge a key, deal 2 to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Champion’s Challenge
cards.text: Play: Destroy each enemy creature except the most powerful enemy creature. Destroy each friendly creature except the most powerful friendly creature. Ready and fight with your remaining creature.

cards.name: Endless Hordes
cards.text: Play: For each enemy creature, make a token creature, ready it, and have it fight that enemy creature, ignoring taunt. Resolve these fights one at a time.

cards.name: Frost Giant
cards.text: Frost Giant does not ready during your “ready cards” step.

cards.name: Guji Dinosaur Hunter
cards.text:
Elusive.
Action: Deal 2 to a creature. Deal 6 instead if it is a Dinosaur creature or has  on it.

cards.name: Hallafest
cards.text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for up to 4 Bräkken cards with different names. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Gain chains equal to the number of cards put into your hand in this way.

cards.name: Harmal Atoon
cards.text: Each other friendly Brobnar creature gains, “Destroyed: Return this creature to its owner’s hand.”

cards.name: Iron Obelisk
cards.text: Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

cards.name: Kretchee
cards.text: Each time a player exalts a creature or a creature captures , put 1 on that creature from the common supply.

cards.name: Lava Ball
cards.text:
Play: Deal 4 to a creature, 
with 2 splash.

cards.name: Looter Goblin
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 after an enemy creature is destroyed.

cards.name: Nirbor Flamewing
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, if Nirbor Flamewing is in your discard pile, you may destroy a friendly creature. If you do, put Nirbor Flamewing into play ready.
Destroyed: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Pingle Who Annoys
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After an enemy creature enters play, deal 1 to it.

cards.name: Revna Starsong
cards.text: Each friendly Berserker loses all After Fight effects.

cards.name: Signal Fire
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Signal Fire. For the remainder of the turn, friendly Brobnar creatures may fight as though they belonged to the active house..

cards.name: The Floor is Lava
cards.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 to a friendly creature and 1 to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Blood of Titans
cards.text: This creature gets +5 power.

cards.name: Brawl In
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Enrage them.

cards.name: Broken Axe Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, deal 6 to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Crim Torchtooth
cards.text:
Splash-attack 4. (When this creature attacks, also deal 4 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)
After Fight: Enrage each of Crim Torchtooth’s neighbors.

cards.name: Earthshaker
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or lower.

cards.name: Feats of Strength
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each time an enemy creature is destroyed in a fight, make a token creature.

cards.name: Flamethrower
cards.text: Action: Deal 1 to a creature, with 1 splash.

cards.name: Ged Hammer
cards.text: Destroyed: Ready and enrage each other friendly Brobnar creature.

cards.name: Hebe the Huge
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to each other undamaged creature.

cards.name: Overrun
cards.text: Play: If 3 or more enemy creatures have been destroyed this turn, your opponent loses 2.

cards.name: Shattered Throne
cards.text: After a creature is used to fight, it captures 1.

cards.name: Smith
cards.text: Play: Gain 2 if you control more creatures than your opponent.

cards.name: The Grand Gord
cards.text: At the start of your turn, if you control the most powerful creature (or a creature tied for most powerful), make a token creature.

cards.name: Unguarded Camp
cards.text: Play: For each creature you control in excess of your opponent, a friendly creature captures 1. Each creature cannot capture more than 1 this way.

cards.name: Vow of Blood
cards.text:
Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
Play: Deal 2 to each damaged enemy creature.

cards.name: Vulka
cards.text: Each friendly Brobnar creature gains splash-attack 1.

cards.name: Berserker Slam
cards.text: Play: Deal 4 to a flank creature. If this damage destroys that creature, its controller loses 1.

cards.name: Brikk Nastee
cards.text: After another friendly Brobnar creature fights, gain 1.

cards.name: Bumpsy
cards.text: Play: Your opponent loses 1.

cards.name: Crogg the Clumsy
cards.text: Splash-attack 2. (When this creature attacks, also deal 2 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)

cards.name: Firespitter
cards.text: Before Fight: Deal 1 to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Fresh Marks
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, exalt 3 enemy creatures.

cards.name: Jarl Svend
cards.text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Jarl Svend, make a token creature. (Jarl Svend must survive the fight.)

cards.name: Might Club
cards.text: Action: Ready and enrage a creature.

cards.name: Pelf
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
After Fight: Your opponent loses 1.

cards.name: Pound
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature, with 1 splash.

cards.name: Press Gang
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If an enemy creature was destroyed this turn, archive Press Gang.

cards.name: Ragnarok Prep
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Then, if you control more creatures than your opponent, your opponent loses 2.

cards.name: Rant and Rive
cards.text: Play: If your opponent has 8 or more, they lose half their  (rounding down the loss).

cards.name: Rowdy Skald
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Shock Herder
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Play: Ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

cards.name: Stratosmack
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, make a token creature.

cards.name: Berserker
cards.text:
Berserker enters play ready and enraged. 
After Fight: Destroy Berserker.

cards.name: Warrior
cards.text: Warrior cannot reap unless there are no enemy creatures in play.

cards.name: Skirmisher
cards.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)

cards.name: Grumpus
cards.text: Splash-attack 1. (When this creature attacks, also deal 1 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors).

cards.name: Æmbitrage
cards.text:
Your keys cost +1. 
During your “draw cards” step, refill your hand to 1 additional card.

cards.name: Antiquities Dealer
cards.text: Action: Gain 2 if you control at least one artifact.

cards.name: Avid Collecting
cards.text: Play: Return a friendly token creature to your hand.

cards.name: Conductor Jărroyă
cards.text: After Reap: Ready each friendly Buggy artifact.

cards.name: Corner the Market
cards.text: Play: During your opponent’s next turn, they cannot play cards, and each time they discard a card from their hand, they may instead archive that card.

cards.name: Cursed Relic
cards.text:
Enhance . 
You cannot play Cursed Relic.
Cursed Relic cannot be discarded from your hand except through card abilities.

cards.name: Envoy of Ekwirrĕ
cards.text: After Reap: Swap Envoy of Ekwirrĕ with one of its neighbors. Also swap all , damage, counters, and upgrades on these creatures.

cards.name: Flea Market
cards.text: Action: Look at a random card in your opponent’s hand. You may give your opponent 1. If you do, play that card as if it were yours.

cards.name: Freelancer
cards.text:
At the start of each turn, the active player takes control of this creature.
This creature may be used as if it belonged to the active house.

cards.name: Insurance Policy
cards.text:
This creature gains, “Destroyed: If it is not your turn, gain 4.”
Play: Lose 1.

cards.name: Molluscaller
cards.text: After Reap: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly Strange Shell gets +3 power and loses all abilities.

cards.name: Staff Up
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, when any amount of  would be added to your pool, make that many token creatures instead.

cards.name: Talent Scout
cards.text:
Talent Scout may be used as if it belonged to the active house. 
Play: Look at your opponent’s hand and play a creature from it as if it were yours. Your opponent takes control of Talent Scout.

cards.name: The Æmber Road
cards.text: Omni: Put 1 trade counter on The Æmber Road, then gain 1 for each trade counter on it. Give control of The Æmber Road to your opponent.

cards.name: Token of Appreciation
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Forge a key at +7 current cost, reduced by 1 for each friendly token creature.

cards.name: Tourist Trap
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature.
Action: Choose a friendly token creature and an enemy creature. If you do, swap control of those creatures.

cards.name: Transitory Philosopher
cards.text: Action: Steal 1 for each enemy artifact.

cards.name: Exchange Program
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly flank creature and an enemy flank creature. If you do, swap control of those creatures.

cards.name: Exo-shell System
cards.text:
Each friendly token creature gains elusive.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Gĕzdrutyŏ the Arcane
cards.text: Action: Steal 2. Flip Gĕzdrutyŏ the Arcane facedown (it becomes a token creature).

cards.name: Gezrăhi Blacksmith
cards.text:
Elusive.
At the start of each player’s turn, that player chooses to either make a token creature or draw a card.

cards.name: Ikwijĭ Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Market Crash
cards.text: Play: Destroy each non‑token creature. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Niffle Paw
cards.text: This creature gains, “After Reap: Destroy this creature and attach Niffle Paw to another creature.”

cards.name: Outnegotiate
cards.text: Play: Choose a card in your opponent’s discard pile. Steal  equal to the number of  bonus icons on that card and put that card on the bottom of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Pull Up Stakes
cards.text: Play: Shuffle 2 friendly creatures into their owners’ decks. Return 4 enemy creatures to their owners’ hands.

cards.name: Puzzling Trinket
cards.text:
Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
When you resolve an  bonus icon, you may choose to resolve it as a , , or  icon instead.

cards.name: Sandhopper
cards.text: Action: Return a friendly creature to its owner’s hand. If you do, you may play a non‑Ekwidon creature from your hand.

cards.name: Scrapscrounger
cards.text: After Reap: Swap an artifact from your discard pile with a card in your hand.

cards.name: Shĭzyokŭ Swopper
cards.text: After Fight: Swap control of this creature and the creature it fights. (Both creatures must survive the fight.)

cards.name: Trade Secrets
cards.text: Play: Discard any number of Ekwidon cards from your hand. Steal 1 for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Tya-Arhĭ, Esquire
cards.text: Each friendly non‑token creature gains, “Destroyed: Make a token creature.”

cards.name: Uncommon Currency
cards.text: Action: Swap control of Uncommon Currency and an enemy artifact.

cards.name: Auction Off
cards.text: Play: Purge an artifact. Its controller gains 1.

cards.name: Belligerent Guard
cards.text:
Belligerent Guard enters play ready.
Play: Your opponent draws a card.

cards.name: Closed-Door Negotiation
cards.text: Play: Your opponent draws a card. Steal 1. If you do and your opponent still has more  than you, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Dthoshră, Recruiter
cards.text: After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Forced Retirement
cards.text: Play: Destroy a creature. If you do, its controller gains 1.

cards.name: Gemcoat Vendor
cards.text: Action: Steal 1. Deal 1 to Gemcoat Vendor.

cards.name: General Ză-Orhă
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
Play: For each forged key your opponent has, make a token creature.

cards.name: Generous Offer
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, steal 2.

cards.name: Hire On
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there is a combined total of 6 or more between both players’ pools, archive Hire On.

cards.name: Mass Buyout
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature. Each player gains  equal to half the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way (rounded up).

cards.name: Ornate Talking Tray
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Ornate Talking Tray. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Shopping Spree
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Shrewd Investor
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Play: You may have your opponent gain 1. If you do, capture 4.

cards.name: Steward Su-Uzyanĕ
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: The Old Tinker
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.

cards.name: The Visible Hand
cards.text: Play: Make 2 token creatures. Reveal your hand to your opponent.

cards.name: Trading Frenzy
cards.text: Play: A friendly creature and an enemy creature each capture 3 from their opponent.

cards.name: Shĭgzisŏ Buggy
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, gain 2.

cards.name: Shĭsnyasĭ Buggy
cards.text: Action: Lose 1. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Shĭzyokŭ Buggy
cards.text: Action: Reveal two cards from your hand. If they share a house, discard them and make a token creature.

cards.name: Strange Shell
cards.text:
Strange Shell cannot fight or reap.
Action: Put Strange Shell into your hand.

cards.name: Diplomat
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: Each player gains 1.

cards.name: Trader
cards.text: Action: Steal 1. Destroy Trader.

cards.name: Prospector
cards.text: Destroyed: Draw a card.

cards.name: Big Magnet
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature. Take control of each upgrade in play and move it to that creature.

cards.name: Blorb Hive
cards.text: Omni: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, make 2 Blorbs. Then, if you control 10 or more Blorbs, destroy Blorb Hive and forge a key at no cost.

cards.name: Borka Rikk
cards.text: Each time a Mars card is discarded from your hand, make a token creature.

cards.name: Commpod
cards.text: Action: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. For each card revealed this way, you may ready a Mars creature.

cards.name: Destructive Analysis
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature. You may purge any number of cards from your archives. Deal an additional 2 to the same creature for each card purged this way.

cards.name: Extinction
cards.text: Play: Destroy a creature and each creature that shares a trait with it. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: Feeding Pit
cards.text: Action: Discard a creature from your hand. If you do, gain 1.

cards.name: Grondal
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, destroy the least powerful creature.
Play: Make 2 token creatures.

cards.name: Hypnotic Command
cards.text: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, choose an enemy creature to capture 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Incubation Chamber
cards.text: Omni: You may reveal a Mars creature from your hand. If you do, archive it.

cards.name: Martian Revolution
cards.text: Play: Destroy each friendly creature. For each creature destroyed this way, make a token creature.

cards.name: Martians Make Bad Allies
cards.text: Play: Reveal your hand. Purge each revealed non‑Mars creature and gain 1 for each card purged this way.

vi.name: Đồng Minh Sao Hỏa Tồi Tệ

cards.name: Nautilixian
cards.text:
Nautilixian cannot be used unless you have used 1 or more friendly Mars creatures this turn.
Each friendly Pilot creature cannot be dealt damage or destroyed.

cards.name: Phylyx the Disintegrator
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Action: Your opponent loses 1 for each other friendly Mars creature.

cards.name: Qyxxlyx Plague Master
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: Deal 3 to each Human creature. This damage cannot be prevented by armor.

cards.name: R-Evolution
cards.text: This creature and each creature with the same name as it gain, “After Reap: Deal 2 to an enemy creature.”

cards.name: Replay Pod
cards.text:
Each friendly Mars creature gains “Destroyed: Place this creature facedown under Replay Pod.”
Action: Put each card under Replay Pod into your hand. Purge Replay Pod.

cards.name: Revo Hooligans
cards.text:
Elusive.
After Reap: Put a paint counter on an artifact. While that artifact has a paint counter, it belongs to house Mars (instead of its other houses).

cards.name: Swap Widget
cards.text: Action: Return a ready friendly Mars creature to your hand. If you do, put a Mars creature with a different name from your hand into play, then ready it.

cards.name: Total Recall
cards.text: Play: For each friendly ready creature, gain 1. Return each friendly creature to your hand.

cards.name: Yxlyx Stimrager
cards.text: After Fight: Deal 2 to a creature and move it to either flank of its controller’s battleline.

cards.name: Airlock
cards.text: Action: Discard a non‑Mars card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Crystal Hive
cards.text: Action: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 after a creature reaps.

cards.name: Destroy Them All!
cards.text: Play: Destroy an artifact, a creature, and an upgrade.

cards.name: Ether Spider
cards.text:
Ether Spider deals no damage when fighting.
Each  that would be added to your opponent’s pool is captured by Ether Spider instead.

cards.name: Exterminate! Exterminate!
cards.text: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, destroy a non‑Mars creature with lower power.

cards.name: Ironyx Banner
cards.text:
Each friendly Ironyx creature gets +1 power and +1 armor.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Memrox the Red
cards.text:
Your opponent’s cards cannot leave your archives.
Action: Gain 1 for each card in your archives.

cards.name: Mothership Support
cards.text: Play: For each friendly ready Mars creature, deal 2 to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

vi.name: Hỗ Trợ Từ Phi Thuyền Mẹ

cards.name: Nyyon Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, make 2 token creatures.

cards.name: Nyzyk Resonator
cards.text: For each neighbor Nyzyk Resonator has, your opponent’s keys cost +2.

cards.name: Psychic Network
cards.text: Play: Steal 1 for each friendly ready Mars creature.

cards.name: Red Planet Ray Gun
cards.text: This creature gains, “After Reap: Choose a creature. Deal 1 to that creature for each Mars creature in play.”

cards.name: Space Invaders
cards.text: Play: Reveal any number of creatures from your hand. Put each creature revealed this way into play facedown as a token creature.

cards.name: Suspended Animation
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Put a damaged enemy creature into your archives. If it leaves your archives, put it into its owner’s hand instead.

cards.name: Yxl the Iron Captain
cards.text: Play: Each friendly Ironyx creature captures 2.

cards.name: Zizok
cards.text:
Skirmish. Splash-attack 1.
After an enemy creature is destroyed by Zizok’s splash-attack damage, ready Zizok.

cards.name: Ammonia Clouds
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to each creature.

cards.name: Braindart
cards.text: Play: Enrage an enemy creature. It captures 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Clone Home
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there are more friendly creatures than enemy creatures, archive Clone Home.

cards.name: Genetic Blast
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

cards.name: Glylyx Weaponsmith
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Ironyx Propaganda
cards.text: This creature gains, “After Fight/After Reap: Make a token creature.”

cards.name: Ironyx Rebel
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Play: Ready each of Ironyx Rebel’s Mars neighbors.

cards.name: Ironyx Vatminder
cards.text: Play/Destroyed: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Kaboom!
cards.text: Play: Put each Mars creature into its owner’s archives. Destroy each creature. Gain 3 chains.

cards.name: Mars Needs Æmber
cards.text: Play: Each damaged enemy non‑Mars creature captures 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Mk.2 Generator
cards.text:
Mk.2 Generator enters play ready.
Action: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Myx, the Tallminded
cards.text: Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each friendly Mars creature in play.

cards.name: Scoop Up
cards.text: Play: Put a friendly non‑Mars creature and an enemy non‑Mars creature into your archives. If that enemy creature would leave your archives, return it to its owner’s hand instead.

cards.name: Tyxl Beambuckler
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature and move it to either flank of its controller’s battleline.

cards.name: Xanthyx Harvester
cards.text:
Xanthyx Harvester cannot be used while it has a non‑Mars neighbor.
After Reap: Gain 1.

cards.name: Yxlix Mesmerist
cards.text: Action: A creature captures 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Blorb
cards.text:
Elusive. Blorb cannot reap.
Destroyed: Return Blorb Hive from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Green Aeronaut
cards.text: Action: A friendly Nautilixian gains Splash-attack 3 for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Purple Aeronaut
cards.text: After 4 friendly Pilot creatures are used in the same turn, a friendly Nautilixian gains “After Fight: Destroy each enemy creature” for the remainder of that turn.

cards.name: Red Aeronaut
cards.text:
Play: Search your deck and discard pile for a Nautilixian and put it into play, then shuffle your deck.
Action: A friendly Nautilixian gets +5 power for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: White Aeronaut
cards.text: Action: Ward and fully heal a friendly Nautilixian.

cards.name: Rebel
cards.text: After Reap: Deal 1 to a creature.

cards.name: Researcher
cards.text: Omni: Reveal a Mars card from your hand and archive it.

cards.name: Aja the Inconspicuous
cards.text: While Aja the Inconspicuous is not on a flank, it cannot be dealt damage.

cards.name: Anahita the Trader
cards.text: After Reap: Give control of a friendly artifact to your opponent. If you do, they must give you 2.

cards.name: Batariel of the Grey
cards.text: After Reap: Ready each Disciple.

cards.name: Call to Action
cards.text: Play: Ready each friendly Knight creature.

cards.name: Friendship
cards.text: When this creature would be dealt damage, if it has 1 or more neighbors, that damage is divided among its neighbors as evenly as possible instead.

cards.name: Halo of Enlightenment
cards.text:
This creature cannot be attacked while its controller controls a token creature.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Harmonic Ritual
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature. If its left neighbor shares a house with it, gain 1 and repeat this effect on that creature.

cards.name: Heavy Subsidies
cards.text:
Keys cost +6. 
Each creature gains, “After Reap: Gain 1.”

cards.name: Honorable Claim
cards.text: Play: Each friendly Knight creature captures 1.

cards.name: Lady Loreena
cards.text:
Taunt.
Lady Loreena’s taunt also applies to its neighbors’ neighbors.

cards.name: Martyr’s End
cards.text: Play: Destroy any number of friendly creatures. Gain 1 for each creature destroyed this way.

cards.name: Mighty Lance
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to a creature and 3 to a neighbor of that creature.

cards.name: Numquid the Fair
cards.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature. Repeat this effect if your opponent still controls more creatures than you.

cards.name: One Stood Against Many
cards.text: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature 3 times, each time against a different enemy creature. Resolve these fights one at a time.

cards.name: Proclamation 346E
cards.text: While your opponent does not control creatures from 3 different houses, their keys cost +2.

cards.name: Renewed Life
cards.text: Play: Fully heal a creature. Make a token creature for each damage healed this way.

cards.name: Sanctum Guardian
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
After Fight/After Reap: Swap Sanctum Guardian with another friendly creature in your battleline.

cards.name: Sariel the Steadfast
cards.text: While it is not your turn, your creatures cannot become exhausted.

cards.name: The Promised Blade
cards.text:
At the start of each player’s turn, the player with the fewest creatures in play takes control of The Promised Blade. 
Omni: A friendly creature captures 1.

cards.name: Zephon the Opulent
cards.text:
Zephon the Opulent cannot be used unless there are 2 or more friendly token creatures in play.
Play: Make 2 token creatures.
After Reap: Gain 2.

cards.name: Almsmaster
cards.text:
Deploy. Taunt.
Play: Each of Almsmaster’s neighbors captures 1.

cards.name: Baldric the Bold
cards.text: Before Fight: If the creature Baldric the Bold fights is the most powerful enemy creature, gain 2.

cards.name: Glorious Few
cards.text: Play: For each creature your opponent controls in excess of you, gain 1.

cards.name: Grey Abbess
cards.text:
Each friendly token creature gets +1 armor.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Grey Augur
cards.text: Each of Grey Augur’s neighbors gains, “After Fight: Gain 1.”

cards.name: Haedroth’s Wall
cards.text: Each friendly flank creature gets +2 power.

cards.name: Hymn to Duma
cards.text: Each friendly creature gains, “Omni: Destroy this creature. A friendly creature captures 2.”

cards.name: Katerina the Summoner
cards.text:
Play/After Reap: Capture 1.
Destroyed: Make a token creature for each  on Katerina the Summoner.

cards.name: Light Everlasting
cards.text: Play: Play a Sanctum creature from your discard pile anywhere in your battleline.

cards.name: Lightbringer Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, a friendly creature captures 3.

cards.name: Martyr of the Vault
cards.text: Destroyed: If your opponent has 7 or more, they lose all but 5.

cards.name: Shoulder Armor
cards.text: While this creature is on a flank, it gets +2 armor and +2 power.

cards.name: Sigil of Brotherhood
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Sigil of Brotherhood. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly Sanctum creatures.

cards.name: Squire Recruitment
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature for each friendly Knight creature.

cards.name: Absolve
cards.text: Play: Heal 1 damage from each creature. Each creature healed this way captures 1 from its opponent.

cards.name: Battlefield Evangelist
cards.text: After Fight: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Celestial Gorm
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Celestial Gorm. Return each other artifact to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Challe the Safeguard
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

cards.name: Colonel Mariana
cards.text: Play: Each friendly Knight captures 1.

cards.name: Grand Melee
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature that does not share a house with at least 1 of its neighbors.

cards.name: Kassiel the Benevolent
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Knightapult
cards.text: Action: The next time a friendly creature enters play this turn, you may have it enter anywhere in your battleline, ready.

cards.name: Membership Drive
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Gain 1 for each friendly token creature.

cards.name: Muster
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If your opponent has more  than you, archive Muster.

cards.name: Ostentatious Mount
cards.text:
This creature gains taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Play: Move this creature anywhere in its controller’s battleline.

cards.name: Outflank
cards.text: Play: Each Sanctum flank creature captures 2 from its opponent.

cards.name: Pandulf the Provoker
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Play: Enrage an enemy creature.

cards.name: Request Donations
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature. 
It captures 2.

cards.name: Retribution
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, destroy an enemy creature.

cards.name: Revered Monk
cards.text: Revered Monk gets +2 armor for each of its Sanctum neighbors.

cards.name: Taxing Journey
cards.text: Play: A friendly creature captures 1. Each of its neighbors that shares a house with it also captures 1.

cards.name: The Grey Rider
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Play/After Fight/After Reap: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

cards.name: Disciple
cards.text: Disciple gets +1 power and +1 armor for each Monk neighbor it has.

cards.name: Cleric
cards.text: After Cleric enters play, capture 1.

cards.name: Squire
cards.text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

cards.name: Aedile Tullia
cards.text: Each time you exalt a friendly non‑token creature, make a token creature.

cards.name: Amphora Captura
cards.text:
Enhance . 
When resolving a bonus icon, you may choose to resolve it as a  bonus icon instead.

cards.name: Aristotlmimus
cards.text: After Reap: If Aristotlmimus has a wisdom counter, draw 1 card, archive 1 card, and play a card from your archives. Otherwise, you may play a card from your archives.

cards.name: City Gates
cards.text: Action: A friendly creature captures 1. If that creature is a Dinosaur, it captures 2 instead.

cards.name: Conscription
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, make a number of token creatures equal to the difference.

cards.name: Eclectic Ambrosius
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, put a knowledge counter on Eclectic Ambrosius.
Action: Remove 3 knowledge counters from Eclectic Ambrosius. If you do, gain 6.

cards.name: Edict of Nerotaurus
cards.text:
After a creature reaps, the next time a creature is used that turn, it cannot reap.
After a creature fights, the next time a creature is used that turn, it cannot fight.

cards.name: Election
cards.text:
Each creature gains, “After Reap: Put a Yea or a Nay counter on Election.”
If Election has 6 Yea counters on it, destroy it and destroy each creature.
If Election has 6 Nay counters on it, destroy each artifact.

cards.name: Enlist Numeri
cards.text: Play: Take control of an enemy creature with  on it. While under your control, it belongs to house Saurian. (Instead of its original house.)

cards.name: Forum of Giants
cards.text: At the start of your turn, the player who controls the most powerful creature gains 1.

cards.name: Good of the Many
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature that does not share a trait with another creature in its controller’s battleline.

cards.name: Hastatus Raptor
cards.text: Before Fight: You may exalt Hastatus Raptor. If you do, deal 1 to the creature Hastatus Raptor fights for each  on friendly Hastatus Raptors.

cards.name: Legion’s March
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, after you use a Dinosaur creature, deal 1 to each non‑Dinosaur creature.

cards.name: Magistrate Crispus
cards.text: At the end of your turn, each player takes control of each creature and artifact they own.

cards.name: Patronage
cards.text: Play: Move half the  from a creature to your pool (rounding up). Move the remaining  from that creature to your opponent’s pool.

cards.name: Platopelta
cards.text: After Reap: If Platopelta has a wisdom counter, draw 1 card, archive 1 card, and you may put a wisdom counter on Aristotlmimus. Otherwise, archive 1 card.

cards.name: Rampaging Brutodon
cards.text:
In order to use Rampaging Brutodon, you must destroy a friendly creature.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Scylla
cards.text: Each enemy creature gains, “After Reap: Deal 4 to this creature.”

cards.name: Senator Bracchus
cards.text:
You may spend  on friendly creatures as if it were in your pool.
After Fight/After Reap: Exalt Senator Bracchus.

cards.name: Socraterosaurus
cards.text: After Reap: Draw 1 card. You may put a wisdom counter on Platopelta.

cards.name: Spartasaur
cards.text:
After a friendly creature is destroyed, destroy each non‑Dinosaur creature.
After Fight: Gain 2.

cards.name: Tectonic Shift
cards.text: Play: Divide each player’s battleline in half as evenly as possible without changing the order of creatures. For each battleline, destroy each creature in one of the halves.

cards.name: Training Costs
cards.text:
Training Costs cannot be discarded from your hand except through card abilities. 
Play: Lose 2. If you do not, shuffle Training Costs into your deck.

cards.name: Æmbrosia Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, move 1 from a friendly creature to your pool.

cards.name: Ankylo Formation
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
For the remainder of the turn, a friendly creature gains skirmish.
Exalt a friendly creature. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains skirmish.

cards.name: Chaosodon
cards.text:
Splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)
Before Fight: Deal 3 to each of Chaosodon’s neighbors.

cards.name: City-State Interest
cards.text: Play: Each friendly creature captures 1.

cards.name: Hedonistic Intent
cards.text: Play: Exalt each flank creature.

cards.name: Hoplite’s Dory
cards.text: This creature gets +2 power for each exhausted creature to its left.

cards.name: Imperator Drusilla
cards.text:
While there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, Imperator Drusilla gains splash-attack 4.
Play: Destroy another friendly creature.

cards.name: Inspiring Oration
cards.text: Play: Exalt a friendly creature. Make a token creature for each  on that creature.

cards.name: Orator Hissaro
cards.text:
Deploy.
Play: Ready and exalt each of Orator Hissaro’s neighbors. For the remainder of the turn, they belong to house Saurian.

cards.name: Paraguardian
cards.text: After Reap: You may exalt Paraguardian. If you do, ward each of its neighbors.

cards.name: Pax Sauriana
cards.text: Play: Ward each creature.

cards.name: Phalanx Leader
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature immediately to Phalanx Leader’s left.
After Fight/After Reap: Each creature to Phalanx Leader’s left gets +2 power for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Regrettable Meteor
cards.text: Play: Destroy each Dinosaur creature and each creature with power 6 or higher.

cards.name: Saurarium
cards.text: Each creature with the lowest power cannot reap.

cards.name: Tribune Pompitus
cards.text:
Each friendly creature gets +2 power for each  on it.
Before Fight: You may exalt Tribune Pompitus.

cards.name: Aquilia, Lone Hero
cards.text: Omni: Capture 1 if there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures.

cards.name: Arm the Plebeians
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Ward it.

cards.name: Ballistego
cards.text:
While Ballistego has  on it, it gains splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)
Play: You may exalt Ballistego.

cards.name: Beware the Ides
cards.text: Play: Deal 23 to a creature in the center of its controller’s battleline.

cards.name: Chancellor Dexterus
cards.text: After Reap: You may exalt Chancellor Dexterus’s right neighbor. If you do, that creature belongs to house Saurian for the remainder of the turn (instead of its other houses).

cards.name: Crushing Charge
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with power 4 or lower. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: Epic Poem
cards.text: Play: Exalt a friendly creature. Gain 1 for each  on that creature.

cards.name: Faust the Great
cards.text:
Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each friendly creature with  on it.
Play: You may exalt a friendly creature.

cards.name: Grammaticus Thrax
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Legionary Trainer
cards.text:
Each friendly token creature enters play ready.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Longusaur Lector
cards.text: Play/After Reap: You may exalt Longusaur Lector. If you do, make a token creature.

cards.name: Pale Into Insignificance
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature with the lowest power.

cards.name: Phalanx Strike
cards.text: Play: Choose a creature. Deal 1 to it for each friendly creature. You may exalt a friendly creature to repeat the preceding effect.

cards.name: Praetor Marius
cards.text:
After Reap: For each exhausted creature to Praetor Marius’s left,
capture 1.

cards.name: Recruit
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you exalted a friendly creature this turn, archive Recruit.

cards.name: Symposium
cards.text: Play: Exalt, ready, and use a friendly creature. If it is a token creature, you may exalt, ready, and use another friendly creature.

cards.name: Charybdis
cards.text: Each enemy creatures gains, “Before Fight: Lose 1.”

cards.name: Bellatoran Warrior
Scholar
cards.text: After Reap: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Senator
cards.text: Action: Keys cost +1 during your opponent’s next turn.

cards.name: Trooper
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: Exalt Trooper.

cards.name: Com. Officer Hings
cards.text:
Play: You may search your deck for Com. Officer Gross, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
After Fight/After Reap: Draw 1 card for each creature between Com. Officer Hings and Com. Officer Gross.

cards.name: Crash Muldoon
cards.text:
Deploy. 
Crash Muldoon enters play ready. 
Action: Use a neighboring non‑Star Alliance creature.

cards.name: Cultural Exchange
cards.text: Play: Your opponent puts each card from their archives into their hand.

cards.name: General Order 24
cards.text: At the start of each player’s turn, they must choose a creature they control and destroy each creature of the chosen creature’s house. If that player has no creatures in play, destroy General Order 24 instead.

cards.name: Hapless Cadet
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Destroyed: Your opponent loses 3.

cards.name: Hold the Line
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, draw cards equal to the difference.

cards.name: Mirror Shell
cards.text:
This creature gains, “After Fight/After Reap: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly token creature is a copy of this creature.”
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Norbyn’s Cavern
cards.text: Each friendly Æmberling gets +3 power and gains skirmish.

cards.name: Operations Officer Yshi
cards.text:
Taunt. 
Each of Operations Officer Yshi’s neighbors gains “After Fight/After Reap: Capture 1.”

cards.name: Plasma Nozzle
cards.text: This creature gains, “Before Fight: Deal 2 to the attacked creature, with 2 splash.”

cards.name: Psionic Officer Lang
cards.text: After an enemy creature reaps, archive the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Pupgrade
cards.text: Pupgrade may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature gets +3 power and gains, ‘Destroyed: Put Pupgrade on the right flank of your battleline as a creature, ready.’”

cards.name: Quixxle Stone
cards.text: If a player controls more creatures than their opponent, they cannot play creatures.

cards.name: Recruiting Station
cards.text: Omni: Choose a house. Discard the top card of your deck. If it belongs to the chosen house, make a token creature.

cards.name: Shakedown Sullivan
cards.text: After Reap: Choose a creature and discard the top card of its controller’s deck. If that card shares a house with the chosen creature, its controller gains 1. Otherwise, destroy that creature.

cards.name: Stronger Together
cards.text: Play: Ready each Star Alliance creature that has 2 non‑Star Alliance neighbors of different houses.

cards.name: Techivore Pulpate
cards.text: After a player chooses an active house, destroy each artifact of that house.

cards.name: Temporal Purge
cards.text: Play: Flip each token creature faceup. Put each non‑creature card flipped this way into its owner’s discard pile.

cards.name: The Ulfberht Device
cards.text: Each player cannot choose the same active house they chose on their previous turn.

cards.name: Uncharted Lands
cards.text:
Each Star Alliance creature gains, “After Reap: Move 1 from Uncharted Lands to your pool.”
Play: Place 6 from the common supply on Uncharted Lands.

cards.name: Badge of Unity
cards.text: This creature belongs to house Star Alliance in addition to its other houses.

cards.name: Camaraderie
cards.text: Play: Exhaust a friendly Star Alliance creature. If you do, draw 2 cards for each of its non‑Star Alliance neighbors.

cards.name: Collector Boren
cards.text:
After an upgrade is attached to Collector Boren, ready Collector Boren.
Play: Put an upgrade from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Detention Coil
cards.text: This creature cannot fight.

cards.name: FOF Transponder
cards.text: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Make a token creature. Attach FOF Transponder to that creature.”

cards.name: Ganymede Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, archive 2 cards.

cards.name: Grunt Work
cards.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Nurse Soto
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Play/After Fight/After Reap: Heal 3 damage from each of Nurse Soto’s neighbors.

cards.name: Quintrino Warp
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature and an enemy creature. Destroy those creatures and each creature that shares a house with either of them. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: Selective Preservation
cards.text: Play: Choose a creature of each power value. Destroy each creature not chosen.

cards.name: Stealthster
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Stealthster may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature gains elusive.”

cards.name: SV3 Lander
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature. 
Omni: Destroy SV3 Lander. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly token creatures.

cards.name: Tactical Officer Moon
cards.text:
Assault 2. (Before this creature attacks, deal 2 to the attacked enemy.)
Play: You may rearrange the creatures in a player’s battleline.

cards.name: Transporter Platform
cards.text: Action: Return a friendly creature and each upgrade attached to it to their owners’ hands.

cards.name: Xenotraining
cards.text: Play: For each house represented among friendly creatures, a friendly creature captures 1.

cards.name: C.R. Officer Hawkins
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Play: Gain 1 for each of C.R. Officer Hawkins’s non‑Star Alliance neighbors.

cards.name: CXO Taber
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: You may play or use a non‑Star Alliance card this turn.

cards.name: CPO Zytar
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Echo Reflector
cards.text: This creature gains, “Your opponent’s keys cost +3.”

cards.name: Friendly Guide
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After you use one of Friendly Guide’s neighbors, you may use Friendly Guide.

cards.name: Future Booster
cards.text: Omni: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Photon Blast
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature, with 1 splash. If this damage destroys 1 or more creatures, make a token creature.

cards.name: PYR*0
cards.text:
Splash-attack 3. (When this creature attacks, also deal 3 to each of the attacked creature’s neighbors.)
PYR*0 may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature gains splash-attack 3.”

cards.name: Recorded History
cards.text: Play: Reveal up to 3 cards of different houses from your hand. Archive each card revealed this way.

cards.name: Red Alert
cards.text: Play: If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, deal damage to each enemy creature equal to the difference.

cards.name: Rogue Operation
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Steal 1 for each house represented among the discarded cards.

cards.name: Scout Chief Korijir
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature.
After Fight/After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Securi-Droid
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Securi‑Droid may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature gains taunt.”

cards.name: Specialist Guthrak
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
After Fight/After Reap: Capture 1 for each house represented among Specialist Guthrak and its neighbors.

cards.name: Teamwork
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, archive Teamwork.

cards.name: Uplink
cards.text: This creature gains, “Action: Make a token creature for each of this creature’s non‑Star Alliance neighbors.”

cards.name: Com. Officer Gross
cards.text:
Play: You may search your deck for Com. Officer Hings, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
After Fight/After Reap: Give a +1 power counter to each creature between Com. Officer Hings and Com. Officer Gross.

cards.name: Æmberling
cards.text:
Æmberling cannot reap.
You may spend Æmberling as if it were  in your pool. (Discard it, ignoring wards.)

cards.name: Cadet
cards.text: Destroyed: Ready Cadet’s most powerful neighbor.

cards.name: Explorer
cards.text: After Reap: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

cards.name: B0-T
cards.text: Action: Use a friendly non‑Star Alliance creature.

cards.name: Navigator Ali
cards.text: Play/After Fight/After Reap: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

cards.name: Brackish Shoreline
cards.text: After a creature fights, it doesn’t ready during the “ready cards” step this turn.

cards.name: Bryozoarch
cards.text: When your opponent plays an action card, instead of resolving its play effect, destroy the creature on your left flank.

cards.name: Corrode
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
Destroy an artifact.
Destroy an upgrade.
Destroy a creature with armor.

cards.name: Extrematode Infection
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, remove 1 hatch counter from Extrematode Infection. Then if it has no hatch counters, destroy this creature and make 3 token creatures.
Play: Put 3 hatch counters on Extrematode Infection.

cards.name: Giltspine School
cards.text:
Token creatures do not ready during their controller’s “ready cards” step.
Play: Make 3 token creatures.

cards.name: Hypoxia
cards.text: Play: Destroy each token creature.

cards.name: Kiligog’s Trench
cards.text: At the end of your turn, place 1 depth counter on Kiligog’s Trench, then destroy each creature with power equal to the number of depth counters on Kiligog’s Trench.

cards.name: Llack Gaboon
cards.text: Llack Gaboon gets +1 power for each other exhausted creature. If there are 3 or more other exhausted creatures, Llack Gaboon gains skirmish and hazardous 5.

cards.name: Offering to Kiligog
cards.text:
Omni: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, choose a creature in your discard pile. Place it facedown under Offering to Kiligog.
Omni: Put each card under Offering to Kiligog into play facedown as a token creature.

cards.name: Plunder
cards.text: Play: Reveal a random unrevealed card from your opponent’s hand. Then, you may either repeat this effect or your opponent discards the last revealed card.

cards.name: Primordial Vault
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, make a Cultist.
Action: Destroy 4 friendly Cultists. If you do, search your deck and discard pile for Tangaika, reveal it, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Rustmiser
cards.text: After Reap: Exhaust each enemy artifact.

cards.name: Sibyl Waimare
cards.text: At the start of your opponent’s turn, that player discards the top card of their deck and exhausts each creature of that card’s house.

cards.name: Sobogg’s Thingamabob
cards.text: After your opponent forges a key, exhaust each creature they control.

cards.name: Tangaika
cards.text:
You cannot play Tangaika unless you control 4 or more Cultists.
Splash-attack 5.
After Fight: Gain 1.

cards.name: Te-wheke Kraken
cards.text:
Play: Exhaust 2 friendly Unfathomable creatures. If you do not, destroy Te‑wheke Kraken.
After Fight/After Reap: Deal 2 to a creature, with 2 splash.

cards.name: Thalassophobia
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 10 cards of your opponent’s deck.

cards.name: The Chosen One
cards.text: Instead of readying creatures they control during their “ready cards” step, your opponent deals 1 to The Chosen One for each exhausted creature they control.

cards.name: Weak Link
cards.text: This creature gains, “While this creature is exhausted, your keys cost +6.”

cards.name: Whirlpool
cards.text: At the end of each player’s turn, that player gives control of the creature on their right flank to their opponent and moves it to that player’s left flank.

cards.name: Allusions of Grandeur
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent’s identity card. If your opponent does not choose that house as their active house on their next turn, gain 3.

cards.name: Azure Basin Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner’s deck. If you do, exhaust 3 enemy creatures.

cards.name: Catch and Release
cards.text: Play: Return each creature to its owner’s hand. Each player discards random cards from their hand until they have 6 or fewer cards in hand. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Dragnet
cards.text: Play: Return a creature and each neighbor that shares a house with it to their owners’ hands.

cards.name: Fuguru
cards.text:
Poison.
Your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Kaupe
cards.text: Your opponent cannot play more than 1 card of each card type (action, artifact, creature, upgrade) each turn.

cards.name: Kelping Hands
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Kelping Hands. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains poison.

cards.name: Physaloha
cards.text:
Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
Damaged creatures do not ready during the “ready cards” step.

cards.name: Sleep with the Fishes
cards.text: Play: Destroy each exhausted creature.

cards.name: Soleft
cards.text: Destroyed: Destroy the creature on your opponent’s left flank.

cards.name: Stir-Crazy
cards.text: Play: Each ready creature captures 1 from its opponent.

cards.name: Thundertow
cards.text: Play: Exhaust 2 creatures. Deal 2 to each exhausted creature.

cards.name: Timoti the Dammed
cards.text:
While you control a token creature, your opponent cannot forge keys.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Under Pressure
cards.text: This creature cannot ready.

cards.name: Watch Your Step
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent’s identity card. If they do not choose that house as their active house during their next turn, make 2 token creatures and ready them.

cards.name: Yanthi Ghostfin
cards.text:
Elusive.
After Reap: Purge a creature from a discard pile. If you do, make a token creature.

cards.name: “Bubbles”
cards.text: Play: Put an enemy creature on top of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Abyssal Sight
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, look at your opponent’s hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Adult Swim
cards.text: Play: Put each creature with power 3 or lower on top of its owner’s deck in a random order.

cards.name: Befuddle
cards.text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent’s identity card. During their next turn, they cannot play cards of other houses.

cards.name: Covetous Hema
cards.text:
While Covetous Hema is not on a flank, it gains elusive.
Play: Capture 3.

cards.name: Crushing Deep
cards.text: Play: During your opponent’s next turn, keys cost +3 for each forged key they have.

cards.name: Fathom Reaver
cards.text:
While you control a token creature, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during the “draw cards” step.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Frigorific Rod
cards.text: Action: Exhaust a creature or artifact.

cards.name: Giltspine Netcaster
cards.text:
Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
After Reap: Exhaust a creature.

cards.name: Initiation
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you have fewer than 4 cards in your hand, archive Initiation.

cards.name: Kamalani
cards.text: Destroyed: Make 2 token creatures.

cards.name: Kelpminder
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Mælstrom
cards.text: Play: Put each creature on top of its owner’s deck in a random order. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: Skullback Crab
cards.text:
Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)
Action: Steal 1.

cards.name: Sunk Cost
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. Your opponent discards a random card from their hand. If that card belongs to the chosen house, make a token creature.

cards.name: Toxicuda Venom
cards.text: This creature gains poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

cards.name: Cultist
cards.text: Action: Destroy Cultist. If you do, ward a friendly creature.

cards.name: Flounderight
cards.text: Destroyed: Destroy the creature on your opponent’s right flank.

cards.name: Fish
cards.text: Destroyed: Deal 2 to the most powerful enemy creature.

cards.name: Priest
cards.text: Action: Exhaust an enemy creature.

cards.name: Raider
cards.text:
Raider gains poison during your turn.
(On your turn, any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

cards.name: Ghostform
cards.text: This creature gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)This creature gains, “Fight/Reap: Archive Ghostform.”

th.name: ร่างวิญญาณ

cards.name: Infomancer
cards.text:
Elusive.
Play: Graft an action card from your hand onto Infomancer. (Place it faceup under this card.)
After Reap: Resolve the play effect of an action card grafted onto Infomancer.

th.name: อินโฟแมนเซอร์

cards.name: Lateral Shift
cards.text: Play: Look at your opponent’s hand. Play a card from that hand as if it were yours.

th.name: ท่องมิติคู่ขนาน

cards.name: Memolith
cards.text: Action: Graft an action card from your hand onto Memolith (place it faceup under this card), or resolve the play effect of an action card grafted onto Memolith.

cards.name: Nizak, The Forgotten
cards.text:
While fighting, Nizak, The Forgotten gains invulnerable. (It cannot be destroyed or dealt damage.)
After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Nizak, The Forgotten, return that creature to its owner’s hand.

th.name: นิซแซคผู้ถูกลืม

cards.name: The Grim Reaper
cards.text:
If you are haunted, The Grim Reaper enters play ready. (You are haunted if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile.)
After Reap: Purge an enemy creature and a friendly creature.

th.name: กริมรีปเปอร์

cards.name: The Red Baron
cards.text: While your red key is forged, The Red Baron gains, “Reap: Steal 1A.” While your opponent’s red key is forged, The Red Baron gains elusive.

cards.name: Timequake
cards.text: Play: Shuffle each friendly card in play into your deck. Draw a card for each card shuffled into your deck this way.

th.name: มิติเวลาสั่นสะเทือน

cards.name: Ecto-Charge
cards.text: Play: Forge a key at +20 current cost, reduced by 1 for each card in your discard pile (to a minimum of 6). If you do, purge Ecto-Charge.

cards.name: Near-Future Lens
cards.text:
Play with the top card of your deck revealed.
Omni: Play the top card of your deck as is it belonged to the active house and was in your hand.

cards.name: Curse of Forgetfulness
cards.text:
Treachery. (This card enters play under your opponent’s control.)
At the end of your turn, purge the top card in your discard pile.
